pages.text: The Quantum Link is an item, energy, and fluid transportation method that allows instant teleportation between all distances and dimensions!

Opening up the Quantum Link, you will notice it has an internal capacity of 4000mB, 10MFE, and 3 stacks of items. This is the buffer space, and this is where outgoing and incoming resources will land.$(p)The first thing you need to do is enter a Network ID in the top-right field. This serves as a unique 3-digit number for your Quantum Link Network.

If this is the first device connecting to the Quantum Link Network, you can also register an optional 4-digit passcode. This will be required for all future connections to this Network ID for the rest of time, so make sure it is correct. $(p)If you do not want to set a password, you can leave it blank.

Once the Quantum Link is connected, a portal animation will show in the square. Great!$(p)Now, you can set your modes for Power, Fluid, and Item transport. These can be set to Input (Send) mode, Output (Receive) mode, or Disabled, for each type of product. Once configured, like magic, product will be transmitted between the Links.
$(c)WARNING: The Quantum Link does not chunkload iteself; therefore, you will need to take care of maintaining the loaded chunks yourself to ensure the Quantum Link remains active.
